languages.text: {n}Голос пилота слегка дрожит, но даже страх не может заставить ее перестать пересыпать речь обычными для пустотников словечками жаргона:{/n} "Ваша С-светлость, ну и полетали мы с вами. Еще бы чуть-чуть — и рапортовали бы о посадке небесным бортмеханикам".

{n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос пилота слегка дрожит, но даже страх не может заставить ее перестать пересыпать речь обычными для пустотников словечками жаргона:{/n} "Ваша С-светлость, ну и полетали мы с вами. Еще бы чуть-чуть — и рапортовали бы о посадке небесным бортмеханикам".

traits.locale_text: {n}His voice quivers slightly, but even his fear cannot stop him from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

{n}His voice quivers slightly, but even his fear cannot stop him from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

{n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

{n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

{n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

{n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

languages.text: {n}Ihre Stimme zittert leicht, doch nicht einmal ihre Angst kann sie davon abhalten, die typische Umgangssprache der Raumfahrer zu verwenden:{/n} "Das war ein heftiger F-Flug, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Hätten wir ein kleines bisschen weniger Glück gehabt, würden wir gerade am großen Raumhafen im Himmel einchecken."
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre Stimme zittert leicht, doch nicht einmal ihre Angst kann sie davon abhalten, die typische Umgangssprache der Raumfahrer zu verwenden:{/n} "Das war ein heftiger F-Flug, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Hätten wir ein kleines bisschen weniger Glück gehabt, würden wir gerade am großen Raumhafen im Himmel einchecken."

languages.text: {n}Sa voix tremble légèrement, mais sa frayeur ne l'empêche pas d'utiliser le jargon usuel des cosmomarins :{/n} « S... sacrée balade, hein, Votre Seigneurie ? C'était à un cheveu... On a bien failli tirer notre dernier bord ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sa voix tremble légèrement, mais sa frayeur ne l'empêche pas d'utiliser le jargon usuel des cosmomarins :{/n} « S... sacrée balade, hein, Votre Seigneurie ? C'était à un cheveu... On a bien failli tirer notre dernier bord ! »

languages.text: {n}她的声音带着微微的颤抖。尽管她很害怕，但她还是忍不住说起了虚空士兵的常用黑话。{/n}“大人，那是某种炮……炮球子。要是我们当时运气再差点的话，现在恐怕就要在天上的星港里飞了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的声音带着微微的颤抖。尽管她很害怕，但她还是忍不住说起了虚空士兵的常用黑话。{/n}“大人，那是某种炮……炮球子。要是我们当时运气再差点的话，现在恐怕就要在天上的星港里飞了。”

languages.text: {n}彼女の声は若干震えている。それほど怖がっていても、ヴォイズマンの独特な言い回しが口からボロボロと出てくる。{/n}「す、すごい飛行でした、陛下。あと少し運が悪ければ、大宇宙の港に今すぐチェックインしていたところです」
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の声は若干震えている。それほど怖がっていても、ヴォイズマンの独特な言い回しが口からボロボロと出てくる。{/n}「す、すごい飛行でした、陛下。あと少し運が悪ければ、大宇宙の港に今すぐチェックインしていたところです」

languages.text: {n}Su voz tiembla ligeramente, pero ni siquiera el miedo puede impedirle utilizar la jerga típica de los infantes del vacío.{/n} «Vaya vuelo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Si hubiéramos tenido un poco menos de suerte, ahora mismo estaríamos facturando en el puerto del cielo».
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su voz tiembla ligeramente, pero ni siquiera el miedo puede impedirle utilizar la jerga típica de los infantes del vacío.{/n} «Vaya vuelo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Si hubiéramos tenido un poco menos de suerte, ahora mismo estaríamos facturando en el puerto del cielo».

languages.text: {n}Sesi hafifçe titriyor ama korkusu bile tipik uçsuz eri jargonunu bastıramıyor.{/n} "Feci manevraydı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Şans yüzümüze güldü. Gülmese parçalarımızı uçsuzdan toplayacaklardı."
languages.original_text: {n}Her voice quivers slightly, but even her fear cannot stop her from using typical voidsman jargon,{/n} "That was some f-flight, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. If we'd been a little less lucky, we'd be checking in at the port in the sky right now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sesi hafifçe titriyor ama korkusu bile tipik uçsuz eri jargonunu bastıramıyor.{/n} "Feci manevraydı {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Şans yüzümüze güldü. Gülmese parçalarımızı uçsuzdan toplayacaklardı."
